page.title: 02IN MY HOUSE
page.content: My mum goes to work. She works at the hospital. She is a nurse. My dad goes to work, his job is building houses and mending pipes and putting them in the ground. Every Sunday we go to the swimming baths and every Saturday we have a new toy. After school I play out and sometimes we go on the Downs with our dogs. Every night I read my school book. When we are off school we sometimes go to the beach. When it is my birthday we go to the pictures and go to McDonalds with a friend. By Carmel Bently age 8 { ************************************ My Mum goes to work. She works at a meat factory. My dad goes to work. He works on the railway. His job is a train driver. In the morning I have breakfast and I clean my teeth and go to school. By Carl Townsend age 8
